inclusion.criterion: Patients identified in CMH/Abdominal Pain Team Clinic with Functional
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of upper gastrointestinal surgery or intestinal obstruction.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of disease or symptoms suggestive of underlying malabsorption, Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD), or Peptic Ulcer Disease (PUD).
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History or evidence of chronic illness requiring regular medical care such as diabetes mellitis (DM), liver, heart, kidney, endocrine, or pulmonary disease and asthma that precludes accurate exhalation into the study breath collection apparatus.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Any patient with body Mass index (BMI) less than or equal to 10th percentile for age; or equal to or greater than 90th percentile for age.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient and/or parent not able to read English.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prokinetic or psychotropic medications used within the last 72 hour prior to study.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 31-year-old woman complaining of abdominal pain. She has leukocytosis and a distended appendix with thickened appendiceal wall without perforation, abscess or gangrene.
